bugCmdUsageLong.other: fire your browser at the issue page to report an issue.

createCmdFlagPlugins.other: enabled plugins list, joined by '+', support goimports, mock, swagger

createCmdFlagProtocol.other: protocol to use, gorpc, http, etc

createCmdFlagProtodir.other: include path of the target protofile

createCmdFlagProtofile.other: protofile used as IDL of target service

createCmdUsage.other: quickly create project or rpcstub, based on pb

createCmdUsageLong.other:
quickly create project or rpcstub, based on pb.

'gorpc create' works in 2 modes:
- generate a complete project
- generate only the rpcstub, with option '--rpconly'.

rootCmdUsage.other: gorpc is an efficient too to speedup development

rootCmdUsageLong.other:
gorpc is an efficient too to speedup development.

for example:
- quickly generate project or rpcstub, based on pb
- send rpc request to test the target server
- update template to the newest version
- quickly open issue page to report an issue
- more ...

rpcCmdUsageLong.other:
send rpc request to server.

the request header, request body can be specified via stdin 
or input file, just like the curl gostyle. Besides, target 
server address, network, timeout can be specified, too.

updateCmdUsage.other: quickly update gorpc template or rpcstub, based on pb

updateCmdUsageLong.other:
quickly update gorpc template or rpcstub, based on pb.

so far, this feature hasn't beed fully implemented, coming soon.
